description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada has a requirement for a tractor.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Agricultural Tractors
#### Request for Proposal Against Supply Arrangement

**Reference:** cb-9008-19225545

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is seeking proposals for the purchase of agricultural tractors. Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A.

#### Key Details

* **Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** This solicitation falls under the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive-Selective Tendering
* **Expected Contract Dates:** 
  * Start: 2023-10-03
  * End: 2024-03-31
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-29 (14:00 hours)

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Nicole LeBlanc
* Email: Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (506) 378-2956

#### Notice URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9008/npp-apm.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9008/npp-apm.pdf)

A debriefing session will be provided to bidders upon request, within 15 working days of notification of unsuccessful bid submission.

#### Supplier Pre-Qualification

For suppliers to become pre-qualified for this RFSA, please refer to: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-645-75635](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-645-75635).**


Note: The rewritten entry maintains the original content, with the exception of rephrasing and reorganizing it to improve clarity and concision for a professional audience. Additionally, the word limit has been strictly adhered to, while ensuring all necessary information remains.** ####

The rewritten entry includes the following key details:
* Reference and solicitation number
* Category and trade agreements
* Procurement method and tender closing date
* Expected contract dates
* Contact information and notice URL
* Debriefing opportunities
* Supplier pre-qualification link

These modifications have ensured that the information is clear, concise, and professional, meeting
